rules.natural: If employee1 has completed the basic cybersecurity training, then access is granted to the employee for an electronic device.
Either employee1 has completed the basic cybersecurity training or employee2 has completed the basic cybersecurity training.
Provided that a procedure for incident response has been documented, the security team has authorized access to production servers.
Whenever the data protection policy is updated, the security team does not publish a vulnerability analysis report.
Either advanced cybersecurity training is scheduled, or a phishing awareness workshop is organized.
If a phishing awareness workshop is organized, then the incident response procedure is documented or the data protection policy is updated.

Provided that management has approved the security budget, then if advanced cybersecurity training is scheduled, either the incident response procedure is documented or the data protection policy is updated.
Either management has approved the security budget, or the committee has reviewed the security protocols.

Under the condition that the committee has reviewed the security protocols, then if advanced cybersecurity training is scheduled, either the incident response procedure is documented or the data protection policy is updated.
Whenever employee1 has the skill in social engineering, the security team publishes a vulnerability analysis report.
Either employee1 has the skill in social engineering, or if employee2 completes the basic cybersecurity training, then access is granted to the employee for an electronic device.
Either access to the corporate network has been revoked for employee1, or access has been revoked for employee2.
Under the condition that access to the corporate network has been revoked for employee2, employee1 does not have the skill in social engineering.
Provided that the company laptop is device encrypted, then if access to the corporate network is revoked for employee1, it follows that employee1 does not have the skill in social engineering.
If the internal systems have passed a security audit, then a data breach has not been detected involving sensitive files.
When the company laptop is not device encrypted, a data breach is detected involving sensitive files.
Whenever the company laptop is not device encrypted, the internal systems pass a security audit.

facts.natural: It is not the case that the security team has authorized access to production servers.

target.natural: Access is granted to the employee for an electronic device.

steps.natural: Under the condition that the company laptop is not device encrypted, it is not the case that a data breach is detected involving sensitive files.
The company laptop is device encrypted.
If access to the corporate network has been revoked for employee1, then employee1 does not have the skill in social engineering.
Employee1 does not have the skill in social engineering.
If employee2 has completed the basic cybersecurity training, then access is granted to the employee for an electronic device.
Access is granted to the employee for an electronic device.
Under the condition that advanced cybersecurity training is scheduled, either a procedure for incident response has been documented or the data protection policy has been updated.
Either a procedure for incident response has been documented, or the data protection policy has been updated.
Either the security team has authorized access to production servers, or it is not the case that they have published a vulnerability analysis report.
The security team has not published a vulnerability analysis report.
Employee1 does not have the skill in social engineering.
If employee2 has completed the basic cybersecurity training, then access is granted to the employee for an electronic device.
Access is granted to the employee for an electronic device.

natural_facts.A5: Access to the corporate network has been revoked for employee2.
natural_facts.A6: The company laptop is device encrypted.
natural_facts.A7: A data breach has been detected involving sensitive files.
natural_facts.A8: The internal systems have passed a security audit.
natural_facts.A9: The security team has published a report on vulnerability analysis.
natural_facts.A10: The security team has authorized access to production servers.

natural_facts.A12: The data protection policy has been updated.

natural_facts.A14: A phishing awareness workshop has been organized.

(A1 → G).natural: If employee1 has completed the basic cybersecurity training, then access is granted to the employee for an electronic device.

(A1 ∨ A2).natural: Either employee1 has completed the basic cybersecurity training or employee2 has completed the basic cybersecurity training.

(A10 ∨ ¬A9).natural: Either the security team has authorized access to production servers, or it is not the case that they have published a vulnerability analysis report.

(A11 → A10).natural: Provided that a procedure for incident response has been documented, the security team has authorized access to production servers.

(A11 ∨ A12).natural: Either a procedure for incident response has been documented, or the data protection policy has been updated.

(A12 → ¬A9).natural: Whenever the data protection policy is updated, the security team does not publish a vulnerability analysis report.

(A13 → (A11 ∨ A12)).natural: Under the condition that advanced cybersecurity training is scheduled, either a procedure for incident response has been documented or the data protection policy has been updated.

(A13 ∨ A14).natural: Either advanced cybersecurity training is scheduled, or a phishing awareness workshop is organized.

(A14 → (A11 ∨ A12)).natural: If a phishing awareness workshop is organized, then the incident response procedure is documented or the data protection policy is updated.

(A15 → (A13 → (A11 ∨ A12))).natural: Provided that management has approved the security budget, then if advanced cybersecurity training is scheduled, either the incident response procedure is documented or the data protection policy is updated.

(A15 ∨ A16).natural: Either management has approved the security budget, or the committee has reviewed the security protocols.

(A16 → (A13 → (A11 ∨ A12))).natural: Under the condition that the committee has reviewed the security protocols, then if advanced cybersecurity training is scheduled, either the incident response procedure is documented or the data protection policy is updated.

(A2 → G).natural: If employee2 has completed the basic cybersecurity training, then access is granted to the employee for an electronic device.

(A3 → A9).natural: Whenever employee1 has the skill in social engineering, the security team publishes a vulnerability analysis report.

(A3 ∨ (A2 → G)).natural: Either employee1 has the skill in social engineering, or if employee2 completes the basic cybersecurity training, then access is granted to the employee for an electronic device.

(A4 → ¬A3).natural: If access to the corporate network has been revoked for employee1, then employee1 does not have the skill in social engineering.

(A4 ∨ A5).natural: Either access to the corporate network has been revoked for employee1, or access has been revoked for employee2.

(A5 → ¬A3).natural: Under the condition that access to the corporate network has been revoked for employee2, employee1 does not have the skill in social engineering.

(A6 → (A4 → ¬A3)).natural: Provided that the company laptop is device encrypted, then if access to the corporate network is revoked for employee1, it follows that employee1 does not have the skill in social engineering.

(A8 → ¬A7).natural: If the internal systems have passed a security audit, then a data breach has not been detected involving sensitive files.

(¬A6 → A7).natural: When the company laptop is not device encrypted, a data breach is detected involving sensitive files.

(¬A6 → A8).natural: Whenever the company laptop is not device encrypted, the internal systems pass a security audit.

(¬A6 → ¬A7).natural: Under the condition that the company laptop is not device encrypted, it is not the case that a data breach is detected involving sensitive files.

A6.natural: The company laptop is device encrypted.

G.natural: Access is granted to the employee for an electronic device.

¬A10.natural: It is not the case that the security team has authorized access to production servers.

¬A3.natural: Employee1 does not have the skill in social engineering.

¬A9.natural: The security team has not published a vulnerability analysis report.
